commentBody: Tom has been a wonderful coach and steady leader. Give the lack of talent on his rosters, he has bee amazing/outside of bumbling time management and late game strategy. The lack of premiere talent, outside of a few home runs such as Beckham, is sad. NFL network reported the Giants have the least productive draft over the last five years. Not Tom's department, but it is someone's/most likely Reese's. A new GM and fresh talent would let Tom retire in style. Who on earth would be a better replacement?
